channel.title: Community Memory on
channel.description: Recent content in Community Memory on

item.description: 1 | Relationship Lucidity in grounded relationship. ~ ~ MINT ~ ~ Despite the proliferation of impersonal organizational structures and abstract global economies, only the mutual extension of trust—grounded in affection for our home places—can foster traditions of placemaking strong enough to steward our communities sustainably through generations.

Philosophy of Writing (and Disclaimers) I concede that none of my writing can perfectly represent my thinking, or truth itself—nor do I possess some unique claim on truth, nor do I possess any particular ability to teach you anything.

item.title: 1 | Relationship
item.description: Balancing Agency and Limits Toward Empathetic Placemaking

item.title: 2 | Agency
item.description: Derived in Affectionate Relationship to Each Other and our Places

item.title: 3 | Limits
item.description: Derived in Affectionate Relationship to Each Other and our Places

item.title: 6 | Action
item.description: For an enduring community memory to sustain us, we must act to perpetuate it.

item.title: Admiration
item.description: Conversation        A Brief History of Distributed State by Ethan Buchman        Decentralized Cities and Centralized States by Jon Hillis
